column5: For the fourth straight quarter, we have experienced increases in all stats for the site. The 2nd quarter report for this year (Apr, May,Jun) was by far the busiest ever. Each month saw more than 17,000,000 hits. June was our busiest month in all categories, which is unusual for us...normally by this time of year traffic drops off quite a bit.  Last quarter's numbers of interest- 2,700,000 pages viewed. 577,000 visits 160,000 unique visitors. Well over 200Gb of bandwidth was used up. We now have over 211,000 posts by more than 3,300 members
Thanks for the numbers Rick. They are getting better all the time. Thanks to our members for making that happen.
Well there ya go ! Proves it's not me.....
Well, you are still responsible for 5.5274881516587677725118483412322% of the posts    Just verbose I guess
Thanks for patting me on the back  I deserve it
Thanks Rick, proves we are the best on the net.....
Great stats Rick, Thanx to everyone for makin it happen
Thanks Rick. All of us know OFC Rocks!!
We are all the best !!!!!!!and it what we have all known for along time...cheers evryone
This is clearly a non-fishing tread, why is it not marked as such?    The collective it strong.
I think the jury is still out regarding that,
